maqras.text: 72|1|geudaeneun malhala : na-ege da-eum-ui gyesiga naelyeojyeossnola ; jin-ui han muliga gyeongcheonghan hu malhagil "sillo ulineun nollaun nangsong-eul deul-eossseubnida
72|2|geugeos(kkulan)eun olbaleum-eulo ganeun gil-eul galikigie ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. geuligo ulineun uli junimkke eotteon daedeunghan jonjaedo duji anh-eul geos-ibnida
72|3|sillo uli junim-ui bu(bu)neun jigohasimyeo geubunkkeseoneun baeujado jasigdo gajiji anh-eusyeossseubnida
72|4|sillo uli jung-ui umaehan janeun hananim-e gwanhayeo gadanghaji anhneun mal-eul hagon hayeossseubnida
72|5|“sillo ulineun ingangwa jin-i hananim-e gwanhayeo gyeolko geojis-eul malhaji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
72|6|“sillo ingan namseongdeul-eun jin namseongdeul-ege boholeul yocheonghagon hayeossgo geulihayeo geudeul(ingan)eun geudeul(jin)ege geodeuleum-eul deohae jueossseubnida”
72|7|“geuligo sillo geudeul(ingan)eun, geudaedeul(jin)i saeng-gaghan geoscheoleom hananimkkeseo geu nugudo gyeolko buhwalsikiji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
72|8|“sillo uliga haneul-eul hult-eoboassdeoni geugos(haneul)i pasukkundeulgwa byeolttongbyeoldeullo gadeugchan geos-eul balgyeonhayeossseubnida”

72|9|“sillo ulineun yeosdeudgi wihae geugos(haneul)e chagseoghagon hayeossseubnida. geuleona yeosdeul-eulyeo haneun janeun ije, geuleul wihae junbidoen eomhohaneun byeolttongbyeol-e jigmyeonhaneun geos-ibnida”
72|10|“jigue issneun jadeul-ege nappeun geos-i uidodoen geos-inji animyeon geudeul junimkkeseo geudeul-ege joh-eun geos-eul wonhasineun geos-inji sillo ulineun moleubnida”
72|11|“sillo uli jung-eneun seonlyanghan jadeul-i issgo uli jung-eneun geuleohji anh-eun jadeul-i issseubnida. ulideul-eun ganeun gil-i jegaggag-ieossseubnida”
72|12|“sillo ulineun jigueseo hananim-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eumyeo domanghandaedo uliga geubun-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eum-eul hwagsinhayeossseubnida”

72|13|“sillo uliga indoui malsseum-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. jasin-ui junim-eul midneun jaga issdamyeon geuneun bujoghamdo budanghamdo dulyeowohaji anh-eul geos-ibnida”
72|14|“sillo uliui ilbuneun museullimdeul-imyeo uliui ilbuneun bujolihan jadeul-ibnida. iseullam-eul bad-adeul-in ja geudeul-eun joh-eun geos-eul chuguhan jadeul-ibnida”
72|15|“bujolihan jadeul-e gwanhaeseoneun geudeul-eun jiog-eul wihan jangjagdeomiga doel geos-ibnida”
72|16|man-yag geudeul-i olbaleun gil-eul ttaleumyeo gudgeonhayeossdamyeon naneun geudeul-i pungseonghan mul-eul masidolog hayeoss-eul geos-ila
72|17|geulihayeo naneun geu(eunchong)e gwanhae geudeul-eul siheomhanola. jasin-ui junim-eul tteoollineun il-e deungdollineun ja geubunkkeseoneun geuleul godoen beol sog-e deulge hasil geos-ila
72|18|sillo seong-won-eun hananim-eul wihan geos-ini geudaedeul-eun hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-e gidohaji malla
72|19|sillo hananim-ui jongbog-i seoseo geubunkke gidohal ttae geudeul-eun geuege milchaghagi jigjeon-ieossnola
72|20|geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'naneun ojig naui junimkke gidohal ppun-imyeo geubunkke eotteon daedeunghan jonjaedo duji anhnola
72|21|geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege eotteon haeag-ina joh-eun geosdo tongjehaji moshanola
72|22|geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geu nugudo hananim-eulobuteo naleul guwonhaji moshamyeo naneun gyeolko geubun ioeui dopicheoleul chaj-ji moshal geos-ila’

72|23|‘geuleona hananim-eulobuteoui (jinli) jeondalgwa geubun-ui mesijineun naui mogs-ila. hananimgwa geuui sado-e bulboghaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo jiog-ui bul-i geuui geos-ini geudeul-eun geugos-eseo yeong-wonhi meomul geos-ila’
72|24|‘(geudeul-ui bulsin-eun) geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-eul bol ttaekkajila. geu ttae geudeul-eun nuga deo heoyaghan jolyeogjaleul gajigo deo jeog-eun susjaga doel geos-inji alge doel geos-ila’
72|25|geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'geudaedeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-i gakkaunji animyeon naui junimkkeseo geugeos-e gihan-eul dusyeossneunji naneun moleunola
72|26|‘boiji anhneun geosdo asineun bun. geulihayeo geubunkkeseoneun geu nuguegedo geubun-ui boiji anhneun yeong-yeog-eul boyeojuji anh-eusinola’
72|27|‘geuleona geubunkkeseo seontaeghasin sadoneun ye-oeloseo sillo geubunkkeseoneun geuui apjjoggwa geuui dwijjog saie eomhohaneun jadeul-eul bonaesinola’

72|28|‘ineun, geudeul(ijeon sadodeul)i imi geudeul junim-ui mesijileul jeondalhayeoss-eum-eul geu(sado)ga aldolog hagi wiham-ila. geuligo geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-ege issneun geos-eul auleusimyeo modeun geos-eul susjalo healisyeossnola’
73|1|os-eul duleun jayeo
73|2|geudaeneun eolmagan-eul je-oehagoneun hanbamjung-e il-eona yebaehala
73|3|geuttae(bam)ui jeolban-eul yebaehageona geogiseo jogeumman jul-igeona
73|4|geogie deohala. geuligo geudaeneun kkulan-eul cheoncheonhi nangsonghala
73|5|sillo naneun geudaeege mugeoun malsseum-eul deonjil geos-ila
73|6|sillo hanbam-e il-eonaseo deulineun yebae geugeos-eun gajang gyeongohan geos-imyeo gajang olgod-eun mal-ila
73|7|sillo naj-eneun geudaeege gidalan bunjuham-i jueojinola
73|8|geudaeneun geudae junim-ui ileum-eul tteoolligo oloji geubunkkelo jeonnyeomhala
73|9|dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junim, geubun ioeeneun gyeongbaebad-eul jonjaega eobs-euni geudaeneun geubun-eul uitag-ui daesang-eulo dula
73|10|geudaeneun geudeul-i haneun mal-e innaehago geudeul-eul aleumdabge meollihala
73|11|geuligo geudaeneun nawa anlagham-eul jinin jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-eul noh-adugo geudeul-eul eolmagan neujchueo jula
73|12|sillo na-egeneun jogswaewa taoleuneun bul-i iss-eumyeo
73|13|mog-eul me-uneun eumsiggwa gotongseuleon beol-i issnola
73|14|geunal daejiwa sandeul-eun yodongchimyeo sandeul-eun muneojyeonaelil molae eondeog-i doel geos-ila
73|15|sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege geudaedeul-e daehan jeung-eonjaga doel sadoleul bonaess-euni machi naega palao-ege sadoleul bonaen geosgwa gatnola
73|16|geuleona palaoneun sado-ege bulboghayeossgo ie naneun geuleul geochilge umkyeojab-assnola
73|17|geuleondedo man-yag geudaedeul-i bulsinhandamyeon, geubunkkeseo eolin-ideul-eul baegbalnoindeullo mandeusineun geunal(ui beol)eul geudaedeul-i eotteohge mag-eul geos-inga
73|18|haneul-eun geulo inhae gallajil geos-ila. geubun-ui yagsog-eun silhaengdoege doeeo issnola
73|19|sillo igeos-eun tteoollim-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-eul jab-eula
